ability.Shadow Realm: On switch-in, this Pokemon creates Shadow Realm on the field for 3 turns. Under Shadow Realm, Dark-type moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
ability.Destruction Surge: This Pokemon's next attack deals 2x damage if its stat is lowered.

Abyssal Flame.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Dark Pulse.effect: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

Despair Roar.effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
